transform

public void transform(Matrix m)
Transforms the ray. The direction vector is multiplied with the transpose of the matrix.

Parameters:
m - the m

getDirection

public Vector3D getDirection()
Calculates and returns the direction vector. This is calced by subtracting the rayStartpoint from the point in the rays direction.

Returns:
the direction
